title: Becoming an Australian
creator_credit: George Logan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: It wasn’t until George Logan served in the army overseas that he felt like a true Australian. Serving as an infantryman in Malaya and Vietnam, it was the values of mateship, care and concern for others that remain with Logan today.
creator_credit_for_label: George Logan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
